Class StoryModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • StoryModule
  • public class StoryModule
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains useful static methods that interact with the Story and their file names/paths.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StoryModule()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean fileExists​(java.lang.String path)
      Intended to validate whether the file containing a story already exists.
      static java.lang.String[] fillArray​(Story story)
      Stores the selected Story into an array with one line per index.
      static void listStories​(java.lang.String folder)
      Lists all the story titles that exist in the provided folder
      static java.lang.String whichStory()
      Prompts user for name of story.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • StoryModule

        public StoryModule()

    • Method Detail

      • listStories

        public static void listStories​(java.lang.String folder)
        Lists all the story titles that exist in the provided folder
        Parameters:
        folder - name of folder

      • whichStory

        public static java.lang.String whichStory()
        Prompts user for name of story. Ensures user does not enter null value or empty string.
        Returns:
        title of story selected

      • fileExists

        public static boolean fileExists​(java.lang.String path)
        Intended to validate whether the file containing a story already exists.
        Parameters:
        path - the local path of the story chosen
        Returns:
        true if file exists

      • fillArray

        public static java.lang.String[] fillArray​(Story story)
        Stores the selected Story into an array with one line per index. Intended to be used with values retrieved from the Story class.
        Parameters:
        story - new Story initialized in Driver class
        Returns:
        Story lines stored in an array
